title: pelican paravaigal lyrics Thoranai song lyrics
stanzas:
Movie : Thoranai
Song Name : Pelican Paravaigal
Artists : Ranjith and Reeta
Composer: Mani Sharma

Pelican Paravaigal rendu pacific kadaloram nindru
payilum Bethovan indru Minor major scale endru

akkakkohhh akkakkohhh issai noozhagam noozhagam indru
akkakkohhh akkakkohhh indha noolidai noolidai undu

unnai keyboard yendrenni naaan kaiyai vaikatta
naan L board illai endru inge kaatataaa..............
